attributes.action: Introduce Tax, Mot & Insurance on push bikes:
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Not only do push bikes use the same road we motorist use, but if there is an accident the poor motorist get the blame and has to pay for repairs out of their own pocket. Also introduce some sort of road sense test on every one before they ride on the road, simular to the CBT test for the novist Motor Cyclist.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
